channel.title: Logging in with no parameters [rsloader]
channel.description:
i am currently working on a little oldschool loader for personal use to play and maybe create some helpful functionality built in
i need all of your professional opinions on making the loader safe so i don't get banned.
stop! first let me tell you this is not an rsbot, just a java program that loads the runescape game
i have the applet stub pulling parameters from a hashmap
i only need these two parameters to get the client to load without errors [code]put("6", "0"); put("8", "0");[/code]
i am itching to log in to my newly created loader
the only real work being done is applet.init() and applet.start()
which is being executed from the swing init thread by using SwingUtilities.invokeLater
If I were to log in with just those two params i listed above would I get auto banned?
i remember jagex saying something about how programs like rsbuddy/orion are NOT against the rules but that you should only be careful about the security of your rs account password
as for the world selector i need this parameter [code]put("3", "http://www.runescape.com/slr.ws?order=LPWM")[/code]
that file consists of [img]http://i.imgur.com/mpVtZnU.png[/img]

item.title: Logging in with no parameters [rsloader]
item.dc:creator: @greatpea greatpea
item.description:
@greatpea wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:9, topic:544050”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=662930.msg4435256#msg4435256 date=1404869135]
Speak to Miss Silab/Hikalaka, they both made OSRS loaders when we all played together back in the first months of release.
[/quote]ya mine is still here, just look at my posted threads - you’ll find it there

edit: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,613848.0.html
edit2: rip link… ill reupload it when i get home[/quote]

http://www.mediafire.com/download/9l3ay48mo2426xt/RS2Loader.rar

???

Read full topic

Speak to Miss Silab/Hikalaka, they both made OSRS loaders when we all played together back in the first months of release.

item.title: Logging in with no parameters [rsloader]
item.dc:creator: @greatpea greatpea
item.description:
@greatpea wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:5, topic:544050”]Loaders are not illegal and are safe as long as you pass the required parameters correctly.

RSBuddy’s Orion is a loader developed by Jagex Mod Jacmob.[/quote]my concern is not knowing what all the parameters mean

i said this wasn’t a bot but it’s a project for me to get experience and learn
eventually (when the times right) i wanna add some hooks and have a scriptable interactive client

also i had no idea jacmob got a job at jagex that’s cool af
http://rsplayers.wikia.com/wiki/Mod_Jacmob

Read full topic
